description:
Curated repository of practice problems across subjects with AI-driven selection that adapts to user skill level. Tracks performance metrics and automatically suggests problems at the optimal difficulty level to maintain engagement and learning efficiency.

**Rationale:** Learners need abundant practice opportunities beyond generated questions. A problem bank with smart selection helps users find appropriate challenges without overwhelming beginners or boring advanced users.
title: Practice Problem Bank with Adaptive Selection
